achievement.choseToInsulateHome.title: Bob the Builder
achievement.choseToInsulateHome.descript: Improving the energy efficiency of buildings is necessary to reduce our consumption, and that's the case with you!
achievement.choseToKeepCarForLongTime.de: You are prepared to keep your vehicle for more than 15 years. That means less energy (and materials) to produce new cars.
achievement.choseToReduceComfortTemperat: 19°C max at home! Not always easy to respect, depending on the person, but an easy gain for those who can.
achievement.choseToStopMeat.title: TPMA
achievement.choseToStopMeat.description: Don't touch my pet! You've given up meat, and that's good for greenhouse gases (and energy too).
achievement.choseToStopPlane.title: Catch me if you can!
achievement.choseToStopPlane.description: It won't be easy to get you arrested at an airport because you're no longer flying.
achievement.choseToSwitchToElectricCar.d: Internal combustion vehicles will be banned in Europe in 2035. You're a little ahead of the game, and that's a good thing.
achievement.choseToSwitchToTinyHome.desc: Respect! Living in a home twice as small isn't always easy, but it does mean less energy to heat it.
achievement.directEnergyConsumptionLessT: Your direct energy consumption is less than 25 kWh, i.e. less than half the French average.
achievement.noFossilInDirectEnergyConsum: No more fossil fuels in your direct energy consumption. You are aligned with the National Low Carbon Strategy.
achievement.consumptionAndProductionBala: Your production assumptions may be impossible, but you've managed to balance your energy consumption with production.
achievement.gameFinished.title: I am an OGRE
achievement.gameFinished.description: Congratulations! You've joined the OGRE Workshop community.
achievement.nuclearProductionCredible.de: We don't know if it's right, but your hypothesis for nuclear power is in line with current scenarios (e.g. Négawatt or RTE).
achievement.nuclearProductionExcessive.d: You love nuclear power and you're not shy about it!
achievement.offshoreWindTurbineProductio: Your hypothesis for offshore wind power in {{targetYear}} is credible.
achievement.onshoreWindTurbineProduction: Your hypothesis for onshore wind power in {{targetYear}} is credible.
